Digital One Health Workshop

Date: 13-14 September 2023
Location: Admas Grand Hotel, Entebbe, Uganda

Overview

This workshop will introduce participants to [Topic Name].

Prerequisites

  • A working laptop with [software specifications or requirements]
  • Basic understanding of [any prerequisite knowledge]
  • [Any other prerequisite]

Schedule

Day 1

Time Session Who
11:00 Welcome and overview Adrian Muwonge
11:30 CPHL presentation Adrian Muwonge
12:00 NADDEC presentation Adrian Muwonge
12:30 MWE presentation Adrian Muwonge
13:00 Lunch Everyone
14:00 Digital One Health showcase (The Roslin Institute) Adrian Muwonge
15:15 Afternoon break Everyone
15:45 Digital One Health showcase (Bodastage) Emmanuel Ssebagala
16:30 African Pathogen Data sharing and archive Gerald Mboowa
16:00 Forum Everyone
17:30 END Everyone

Day 2

09:00 Future planning Everyone
10:30 Morning break Everyone
11:00 Workshop recap with HoDs Everyone
12:15 Summary and Wrap-up Everyone
13:00 Lunch Everyone
14:00 END Everyone

Organisers

  • Dr. Adrian Muwonge : Chancellor’s Fellow at The Roslin Institute, University of Edinburgh.
  • Dr. Bryan Wee: Core Scientist at The Roslin Institute, University of Edinburgh. Specialist in bacterial genomics and bioinformatics.
